body.p: You walk towards the SKILL door and it slides open to reveal a dark room beyond. Once again, you step through. The door slides shut behind you and the lights snap on.

There is only one other door in the room, directly opposite to you. On the door are the words REMEMBER ME, and a strange symbol underneath. You look closely at the symbol, sure that it will be important later.
After you’ve stared at the symbol for a while, you figure it’s time to get moving.
